data.title: Heinrich Böll Stiftung
data.meta_description: 'Heinrich Böll Stiftung' published in 'International Encyclopedia of Civil Society'
data.text:
The Heinrich Böll Foundation (HBS) is one of currently six so-called political foundations in Germany. It is affiliated to the Green Party and serves as a Green think tank by providing civic education and scholarship programs in Germany and democracy promotion abroad. In the German political landscape, the HBS plays an important role as an intermediate between state, political party, and civil society by promoting Green values. Like all political foundations, it is mostly financed from public funds.

The Heinrich Böll Stiftung (HBS) is a German political foundation. It is closely affiliated to the Green Party, which is currently member of the opposition in the German Federal Parliament. Like all political foundations, the HBS is strongly interwoven with the party although it is an independent voluntary association. It serves as a think tank for the Green Party.
